item.title: Bad ideologies - Criteria
item.description: “Doubt each old thing you know. Require current evidence. Make it prove itself to be true today. Otherwise, let it go.” - really cannot remember who said it. What is an ideology An ideology is a coherent set of ideas that should help you make sense of the world. Set of normative beliefs and values that a person or other entity hold. Normative : Standard for evaluating or making judgments about behavior or outcomes.
